name: [MizJam1 Entry] Town
description:
My entry for the MizzJam1. Made in about 20 hours out of the allotted 48 hours.

Only the Windows/HTML5 builds have been tested. I am unable to verify the integrity of the Mac/Linux builds. 

==============================

You wake up unable to sleep, with a strange feeling. Your townsfolk are nowhere to be seen. It's up to you to discover their fate.

Controls are explained in the game. 

I recommended to play with sound on for the best experience.
